data.meanings: excited with lust, stirred up, tumultuous, period from birth to the seventeenth year, youth, young man
data.sentence: The word بِغُلَامٍ comes from the root غ ل م and is associated with the meanings: excited with lust, stirred up, tumultuous, period from birth to the seventeenth year, youth, young man

data.meanings: To dream, have a vision, attain to puberty.
data.sentence: The word حَلِيمٍ comes from the root ح ل م and is associated with the meanings: To dream, have a vision, attain to puberty.
